title: Night of the Moonrose
description: On The Night Of The Moonrose, Beth Sherwood was to be married -- and murdered!Because of a quirk of fate, Beth was destined to suffer terror and danger from the moment she came to Devil's Walk--the eerie home of the strange Buxton family.Beth's ordeal began when Lily Buxton, daughter of the grim master of Devil's Walk, fainted at the sight of her. To her horror, Beth learned she resembled Elizabeth Sherwood, who was burned as a Salem witch two hundred years before on the night of the blooming of the moonrose.Now the moonrose was about to bloom again. As the time neared, Beth's life was suddenly in danger. For the master of Devil's Walk worshipped death with life, and he wanted Beth as his next wife--and sacrifice!
author: Miriam Lynch
